greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of labeled digraphs where every node has indegree 0 or outdegree 0 and no isolated nodes.
comment: Also labeled graphs with 2-colored nodes with no isolated nodes where black nodes are only connected to white nodes and vice versa.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n, k)*(2^k-2)^(n-k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 04 2003
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Dec 15 1999
ext: Last 4 terms corrected by _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 04 2003
